entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Gaspé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gaspé Airport 10:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: SW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
